attributes.action: remove VAT from energy saving products and renewable energy source for the home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "remove VAT from energy saving products and renewable energy source for the home."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14796.asp

Prime Minister's Office
